title: Vriksha Rakshak
description: A machine learning-based application that helps identify plant diseases and suggest remedies. It uses Convolutional Neural Networks (CNN) for image-based disease prediction and provides treatment suggestions.

title: ProMed: Medicine Information Management System
description: A healthcare-focused web application for managing medicine data using QR codes. It supports multi-user accounts and sends automated email alerts for expiring medicines.

title: HelpNow AI: Real-Time Emergency Guidance
description: A life-saving AI-powered web application that provides instant, step-by-step medical emergency guidance. Supports voice-based descriptions, text-to-speech instructions, and AI-generated visual aids.
